bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.summary: Polyaxon CE Resolver does not handle missing connections correctly
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
Resolver in Polyaxon CE does not handle missing connections correctly and does not convert exceptions to a run status: Could not create a run. Error message: (405) Reason: Method Not Allowed HTTP response headers: HTTPHeaderDict({'Server': 'nginx/1.10.3', 'Date': 'Wed, 15 Jul 2020 16:42:13 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'text/html; charset=utf-8', 'Content-Length': '0', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Allow': 'GET, HEAD, OPTIONS', 'X-Frame-Options': 'DENY', 'Vary': 'Origin, Cookie', 'X-Content-Type-Options': 'nosniff'}) <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Use a connection in a Polyaxonfile that is not configured in the catalog. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
It should behave similarly to Polyaxon EE: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1261626/87577777-b7118800-c6d3-11ea-8be7-469538f62067.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1261626/87577865-db6d6480-c6d3-11ea-9797-5e221ec04037.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
Polyaxon CE v1.1
